title: C&C Red Alert 3
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, Spanish.  After years of conflict, the Allies are finally on the brink of victory. Cowering behind the walls of the Kremlin, the Soviets decide to turn to one last act of desperation – the use of an experimental time travel device. The mission: to go back in time to eliminate Albert Einstein before he creates the technologies that will lead the Allies to ultimate victory. After a successful mission, the Soviets return to the present, discovering the Allied position has indeed been weakened. But before they can truly celebrate, they find out their actions have spawned a new threat and global superpower, the mysterious, technologically advanced Empire of the Rising Sun. Welcome to World War III.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Ackerman '08 Gamerpics
childDownloads.description: Screw 'em all in 2008! Support Howard Ackerman's bid for President by downloading these patriotic gamerpics.  After seven years, Red Alert is back! Go back in time and battle alongside your friends and Hollywood stars in an action-packed, over-the-top world, as the bestselling and most beloved series of the Command & Conquer franchise returns. Play the campaign with three factions – Allied, Soviet, or the all-new Empire of the Rising Sun – or team up with a friend in the first-ever full RTS co-op campaign on air, land, and sea! Includes over one hour of HD footage starring the biggest live-action cast ever in a video game!  Welcome back, Comrade.

For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: C&C RA3 Gemma Atkinson Gamerpics
childDownloads.description: International supermodel Gemma Atkinson heats up your dashboard as Eva McKenna, from Red Alert 3!   Red Alert is back! One of the biggest franchises of all time returns, featuring the biggest Hollywood cast ever in a video game, an all-new campaign and story, and a co-op campaign! Choose from the Soviets, Allies, or the all-new Empire of the Rising Sun, and battle it out with old favorites like Attack Dogs, Tanya, and Tesla Troopers, and new Soviet War Bears, the Man Cannon, and Yuriko, the psychic school girl. Command & Conquer Red Alert 3 ships this fall!  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: C&C Red Alert 3 Demo
childDownloads.description: Red Alert has arrived on Xbox 360!  Battle alongside your friends and Hollywood stars as the bestselling series of the C&C franchise makes its 360 debut.  Wage war solo or co-op on Xbox Live on land, sea, and air for control of the world with 3 epic factions!  RA3 features the fastest & most precise RTS controls to date on console-plus the biggest Hollywood cast ever in gaming, not to mention War Bears, psychedelic Japanese schoolgirls and dozens of other units!   This SP demo features the game's cinematic opening, 1 campaign mission from both the Soviet and Allied campaigns, and an interactive tutorial.  RA3 game features 3 campaigns (solo or co-op online), a skirmish mode against 9 formidable commanders, and multiplayer over Xbox LIVE.
